Agreement

  • This Token Pre-Sale agreement («Agreement») constitute the agreement between You (hereinafter the “Purchaser” or “You”) and One⁺¹ and sets forth general rules and procedure of One⁺¹ Tokens Pre-Sale by One⁺¹ at CHARITYBLOCKCHAIN.IO («Website») and their purchase by the Purchaser.

  • THIS AGREEMENT CERTIFIES THAT You by clicking the button “I agree” on the Website and payment of ETH or BTC equal to 0.10 USD for one Chek Token according to the cost of ETH or BTC to the date of beginning of the Token Sale (the “Purchase Amount”) for each Chek Token on the specific during the Token Pre-Sale period (the “Payment Date” or “Payment period”), to the Company shall be entitled to take delivery of certain digital cryptographic token (the «Chek Token») upon the occurrence of the Company’s Token Pre-Sale, subject to the provisions set forth below.

  • Token Pre-Sale period is the period of time from 20 Feb 2018 to 20 March 2018 during which the Company shall deliver to the Purchaser a number of Cheks equal to the Purchase Amount paid to the Company by Purchasers in the Token Pre-Sale and additional number of Chek Tokenss as a bonus (according to the procedures referenced in this Agreement). 25% of additional Chek Tokens given for purchases made between 20 Feb 2018 to 6 Mar 2018 and 20% for purchases made between 6 Mar 2018 and 20 Mar 2018.

  • Cheks are available for purchase to Purchasers who are eligible to enter to this agreement according to the clause 20 of this Agreement only during a limited Tokens Pre-Sale period of time that is defined in the clause 4 of this Agreement.

  • Company publication on the Website of an offer to sell Cheks to a number of Purchasers (potential Cheks purchasers) is considered a legally binding offer of the Company to sell Chek Tokens (hereinafter referred to as the “Offer”).

  • The Offer shall be available only at the Website. Any other offers concerning One⁺¹ Tokens Pre-Sale presented on any other websites or internet resources shall be considered null and void and shall not put any obligations upon the Company.

  • The number of Cheks offered for the sale by the Company is limited, as well as the number of mentioned tokens to be purchased by one Purchaser. Such number of Chek Tokens to be sold and available for purchase is defined in the Whitepaper presented on Website.

  • Legally binding acceptance of the Offer shall be conducted by a Purchaser by sending the Purchase Amount of ETH or BTC on the specific smart-contract address published on the Website and clicking the button “I agree” on the Website in the specific field. By this action the respective Purchaser, agree that he fully read, understood and irrevocably accepted this Agreement. From this moment the Offer shall be considered formally accepted by the respective Purchaser.

  • Offer Acceptance shall be deemed irrevocable.

  • The price of one Chek Token is set forth in the amount of ETH or BTC equal to 0.10 USD according to the cost of ETH or BTC to the date of beginning of the Token Pre-Sale. The payment for Chek Tokens can be conducted by Purchasers only in Ethereum (ETH) or Bitcoin (BTC). One⁺¹ does not accept fiat currency as payment for Chek Tokens. In order to buy Chek Tokens Purchaser shall convert such funds into Ethereum (ETH) or Bitcoin (BTC). Technically the payment of Chek Tokens shall be conducted via Ethereum Smart Contract specified on the Website.

  • To purchase Chek Tokens the Purchaser shall only send cryptocurrency funds from his/her personal wallet (hardware wallet) in the amount which is equivalent to the amount of the Chek Tokens the Purchaser is willing to receive for such payment. It is prohibited to send cryptocurrency funds to purchase Chek Tokens from any cryptocurrency exchanges.

  • Purchaser is not entitled to send any funds to purchase Chek Tokens until One⁺¹ Tokens Pre-Sale period has officially begun. Purchaser is not entitled to send any funds to purchase Chek Tokens upon ending of the respective One⁺¹ Tokens Pre-Sale.

  • The Chek Tokens shall be sent to the Purchaser’s personal respective cryptocurrency wallet by the end of One⁺¹ Tokens Pre-Sale period.

  • The purchase of the Chek Tokens by the Purchaser from the Company is final, and, thus, there are no refunds and/or cancellations.

  • Ownership rights for Chek Tokens shall be transferred from the Company to the respective Purchaser upon completion of payment procedure by the Purchaser and completion of KYC procedure only after the end of Token Sale Period.

  • You expressly agree that the Chek Tokens are not registered with any government entity as the securities, shall not be considered as such, are not intended to be commodity or any other kind of financial instrument, do not represent any share, stake or security or equivalent rights, including, but not limited to, any right to receive future revenue shares and intellectual property rights.

  • By purchase of Chek Tokens hereunder the Purchaser represents and warrants that his/her funds in no way came from illegal or unethical sources, that the Purchaser is not using any proceeds of criminal or illegal activity, and that no transaction involving Cheks are being used to facilitate any criminal or illegal activity.

  • The Purchaser is obliged to provide valid proves concerning legality of his/her proceeds used to purchase Chek Tokens upon Company’s request or request of bank institutions or government authorities.

  • By accepting this Agreement and by purchase of the Chek Tokens, the Purchaser represents/warrants and accepts that there are certain risks associated with purchase of Chek Tokens, holding Chek Tokens, and using Chek Tokens described in this Agreement.

  • US, Singapore, Hong Kong and United Kingdom citizens and residents are not eligible and not allowed to participate in the One⁺¹ Tokens Pre-Sale due to various taxation and regulatory issues. The Purchaser is only allowed to purchase Chek Tokens if and by buying Chek Tokens he/she covenants, represents, and warrants that he/she is neither a US, Singapore, Hong Kong and United Kingdom citizen or resident, nor have a primary residence or domicile in the US (including Puerto Rico, the US Virgin Islands, and any other possessions of the US) or Singapore, or Hong Kong, or the United Kingdom. In order to buy Chek Tokens and by buying them Purchaser covenant, represent, and warrant that none of the owners of the company, of which Purchaser is an authorized officer, are US, Singapore, Hong Kong and United Kingdom citizens or residents, nor they have a primary residence or domicile in the United States (including Puerto Rico, the US Virgin Islands, and any other possessions of the US) or Singapore, or Hong Kong, or the United Kingdom. Should this change at any time, Purchaser shall immediately notify the Company. Purchaser also represent and warrant that he (or she) is not a citizen or resident of a geographic area in which access to or use of the cryptocurrency or Tokens is prohibited by applicable law, decree, regulation, treaty, or administrative act. The Company shall reserve the right to refuse selling Chek Tokens to anyone who does not meet the criteria set forth above.

  • The Purchaser is only allowed to purchase Chek Tokens if and by buying Chek Tokens he (or she) covenants, represents, and warrants that he (or she) (under the law of the country of Participant’s residence):

    • is of an age of majority to enter into this Agreement (at least 18 years of age), meets all other eligibility and residency requirements, and is fully able and legally competent to purchase Chek Tokens, enter into agreement with the Company and in doing so will not violate any other agreement to which he (or she) is a party;

    • if he (she) is a corporation, governmental organization or other legal entity, he/she have the right, power and authority to enter into this agreement on behalf of the corporation, governmental organization or other legal entity and bind them to these terms;

    • will not be using the Chek Tokens for any illegal activity, including but not limited to money laundering and the financing of terrorism.

  • Chek Tokens are to be provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis and without any arranties of any kind, either expressed or implied. The Purchaser assume all responsibility and risk with respect to buying of any amount of the Chek Tokenks and their use. The Purchaser hereby expressly agrees that the Company does not accept any liability for any damage or loss, including loss of business, revenue, or profits, or loss of or damage to data, equipment, or software (direct, indirect, punitive, actual, consequential, incidental, special, exemplary or otherwise), resulting from any use of, or inability to use the Website or the material, information, software, facilities, services or content on the Website, as well as from purchasing of the Chek Tokens, regardless of the basis, upon which the liability is claimed and even if the Company has been advised of the possibility of such loss or damage. The Purchaser understands and agrees that the Company shall not be held liable to and shall not accept any liability, obligation or responsibility whatsoever for any change of the value of the Chek Tokens. The Purchaser understands and expressly agrees that the Company shall not guaranty in any way that the Cheks might be sold or transferred during or after the One⁺¹ Token Pre-Sale. The Purchaser understands and agrees that it is his/her obligation to ensure compliance with any legislation relevant to his/her country of domicile concerning purchasing of the Chek Tokens. Purchasing of the Chek Tokens by the Purchaser in no way creates any exclusive relationship between the Purchaser and the Company, nor any partnership, joint venture, employment or agency.
